resourceTemplates.name: smithery-registry-list-servers
resourceTemplates.title: List or search Smithery MCP servers
resourceTemplates.description: Lists publicly available MCP servers from the Smithery.ai registry. Supports semantic search and filters such as owner, repo, is:verified, and is:deployed. Requires a Smithery API key.

resourceTemplates.name: smithery-registry-get-server-info
resourceTemplates.title: Get detailed info about a specific Smithery MCP server
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves full metadata and configuration details for a specific MCP server from the Smithery.ai registry, identified by its qualified name or ID (e.g. smithery/hello-world). Requires a Smithery API key.
